info.name: Pawtel API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Pawtel - Pet Hotel Management System. This collection includes all API endpoints for authentication, bookings, shop, community, and admin functionalities.

item.name: Availability & Pricing

request.description: Get all available room types with pricing
Check room availability for given dates
Get available spa time slots for a specific date
Get available spay/neuter time slots for a specific date

item.description: Check availability and get pricing information

request.description: Get current user's bookings with pagination
Get specific booking details by booking number
Add add-on services to a booking
Remove an add-on service from a booking
Get all documents for a booking
Get all products with filters and pagination
Get order details by order number
Update booking details (status, special requests, final amount)

body.raw:

	"name": "Premium Suite",

	"max_capacity": 2,
	"amenities": ["Air Conditioning", "Premium Bedding", "Play Area"]
}

request.description: Get booking reports with date range and filters
